header_text: You're at a football game with your family, and halftime just started. All of your family members who are there want to leave, but you want to stay for the rest of the game. Since no one is willing to stay with you, you feel like nobody cares about how you feel.

elements.text: The more you think about it, you realize that many people don't enjoy sports the way you do. Just because your family wanted to leave, doesn't mean that they don't care about...

elements.name: You're at a football game with your family, and halftime just started. All of your family members who are there want to leave, but you want to stay for the rest of the game. Since no one is willing to stay with you, you feel like nobody cares about how you feel._Family & Home Life_entry2
